body:
When someone asks Hindenburg if he is going to get a more modern artstyle: 
Y̨͆e̖̦̘̱̪͌͌̇ͣs̢̻͙͇͓̳͕̫ͣ̓n̔͏'͙̂̄͒ͣ̃͠t̿
̙̦̹̝̭̝͈͌̈́̃̏ͯ̀ͤ

Thank you thank you thank you Januz! You're doing gods work.

I can see how people wouldn't like hindenburg's art style but when it comes to pure perversion and x-ray'd creampies, where else are you gonna go?
I feel like the artstyle was a joke at some point but then it got out of hand and now he cant draw in any other style.
Editor: "Hey Hindenburg, it's 2018, maybe you should stop drawing 1990s style doujin porn." Hindenburg: "Nah, I'm good."
